title: Roasted quail with wild mushrooms, kale, fondant potatoes and a tarragon and Madeira sauce
description: A rather impressive, yet not so difficult, dinner for two. Quail is strongly flavoured, rather like duck, but low in fat like chicken and quick to cook.
ingredients: 200g/7oz wild mushrooms (such as chanterelle, ceps, trompette or girolles)
½ head kale, leaves removed, stem discarded and leaves chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
